message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal, considering it's worth $10,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. It's still a good price for me, and I'm willing to make a deal.

Bob, I understand your position, but $7,500 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, how about $8,750? It's still a good deal for you, and it's closer to my minimum price. Let's work this out together!
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm willing to make a deal.
